name: Shrinking Planet 2
description:
The very first project of our gaming studio.

Shrinking Planet 2 is inspired by famous youtuber "Brackeys" Shrinking Planet. Take control of some unique vehicles drive your way through beautiful hand crafted immersive environment while avoiding obstacles on your way and most importantly beware of the meteors falling from the sky. And many more to come in future...

With new GameModes 1.Survival: Take a vehicle and survive as long as you can if it get bores don't worry just take    your vehicle to another  adventurous environment.

2.Compaign: Currently In Development.    where you can expect tricky     challenges and an enjoyable story to    hear.   

3.Multi-Player: Also In Development. but     trust me the longer it takes the  more    excited it gets. You can play together      with friends and against them ;).   Caution: Shrinking Planet 2 is still in development it may contain some bugs.

For more Information: Join us on Discord:https://discord.gg/ywXcCuNtx9 Follow us on Instagram:https://www.instagram.com/blueleafinc001/ Watch us on Youtube:https://m.youtube.com/channel/UC54yYEEtQe1keL6EAxc-S4A
